text:
e="preserve">Minoo Mohraz (, born 19 January 1946) is an Iranian physician, researcher and AIDS specialist. She is a Professor of Infectious Diseases at the Tehran University of Medical Sciences and head of the Iranian Centre for HIV/AIDS. Mohraz was thought to be Iran's foremost medical expert on AIDS. Mohraz was born in Tehran.
During the 2019–20 coronavirus outbreak, she was appointed a member of committee to combat Coronavirus. On 14 March, Iranian media reported that she had been infected with COVID-19.
